title: Bay Area leaders decry Trump administration’s attack on Venezuela - San Francisco Chronicle
description: Bay Area leaders and protesters condemned the Trump administration Saturday for bombing Venezuela and capturing its leader, Nicolás Maduro.

title: Pyongyang fires ballistic missiles as South Korean President Lee Jae Myung makes state visit to China - CNN
description: North Korea fired several ballistic missiles from its capital Pyongyang towards the sea off its east coast at around 7:50 a.m. local time on Sunday, South Korea’s military said.

title: Live: Updates: Kickoff nears for Seahawks-49ers NFC West-deciding showdown - The Seattle Times
description: With the NFC West title on the line and behind a strong defensive showing so far, the Seahawks lead the 49ers 10-3 as the second half begins.

title: Rapid Reactions: Panthers fall to Bucs, division decided Sunday - Panthers.com
description: With both teams now 8-9, the division will be decided by the Falcons-Saints game Sunday, and the Panthers are hoping Atlanta can help.

title: Leonardo DiCaprio to Miss Palm Springs Film Fest Gala Due to Venezuela Air Restrictions (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
description: Leonardo DiCaprio will miss Saturday night's Palm Springs Film Festival Awards Gala amid the developing geopolitical situation in Venezuela.

title: How UK plush toy Jellycat conquered China - BBC
description: The plushies bring "emotional value" to Chinese youth navigating economic uncertainty.

title: Maduro overthrow in oil-rich Venezuela unlikely to shake energy markets in the near term - CNBC
description: While Venezuela has the world's largest oil reserves, its oil production is relatively small.

title: Iran's leader says rioters 'must be put in their place' as protest death toll rises to at least 10 - PBS
description: Iran's supreme leader insisted Saturday that “rioters must be put in their place” after a week of protests that have shaken the Islamic Republic, likely giving security forces a green light to aggressively put down the demonstrations.

title: Measles exposure found in NC - WRAL
description: A person carrying measles traveled through Gaston County while infectious, according to the North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services.
